attributes.action: Scrap Home Office proposals to collect DNA from minor transgressors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Home Office wants to allow police to forcibly extract DNA samples from minor transgressors such as people who forget to wear their seatbelt or who drop litter.
This is counterproductive as it will build resentment against the police and criminalise the law abiding. It is creating a database state where we are all guilty until proven innocent. 
Only those convicted of crimes should be on any DNA database.
